sentences.sentence: This phraseology is intended to appeal to various sides of the conflict.
sentences.translation: 这种措词是有意迎合冲突各方。

sentences.sentence: He had unconsciously dropped back into the phraseology of the first days of his compulsory greatness.
sentences.translation: 他不知不觉地又回到了他最初被迫做了国王的那些日子里说话的语调。

sentences.sentence: A speaker who USES that kind of phraseology has gone some distance toward turning himself into a machine.
sentences.translation: 使用那种措辞的演讲人已经朝着把自己变成机器的方向走了不少路了。
